resources.string: to delete a score do a long press
Click here to see the source code

rules of the game: in this game every 2 cards of the 12 in front of you is part of a pair one is a question the other is the answer
in order to win you mast find all 6 pairs (in case you chose 24 or 36 once you fond 6 pairs a new set of 6 pairs will take there place)
once you have fond all the pairs a win message will appear and your result will be added to the high score list that can be viewed from the highscore button back in the main manu
in the case you did chose to have a timer you will notice a number going down on screen if the timer hits 0 before you find all the pairs you will get a game failed screen and this result will not be added to your high score
in terms of score when you find a correct pair you receive 1 point however if your next pair is correct you will receive 2 points if the next pair is also correct it will be 3 points
however if you get a wrong pair there is no more bonus and you will go back to only 1 point
